select id, openid, order_number, device_number, device_type, lease_time, lease_address, restore_time, restore_address, price, pay_type, net_amount, coupon_price, status, play_time,create_time,child,choose, agentProportion as proportion,hospitalId,investorId,agentId from user_lease_order

select oaad.user_id,oaad.order_number,oaad.proportion,ulo.net_amount,ulo.lease_time,ulo.hospitalId,oaad.price from order_agent_account_detail oaad left join user_lease_order ulo on oaad.order_number = ulo.order_number

SELECT lo.id,lo.openid,u.`nick_name`,u.`phone_number`, lo.order_number, lo.device_number, lo.device_type, lo.lease_time, lo.lease_address,lo.choose,lo.child, IFNULL(h.`hospital_name`,'无') AS hospitalName, lo.restore_time, lo.restore_address, lo.price, lo.pay_type, lo.net_amount, lo.coupon_price, lo.`status`, IFNULL(su.`user_name`,'无') AS agentName, lo.play_time,lo.create_time,lo.investorProportion, lo.agentProportion,lo.`agentHospitalProportion` ,lo.hospitalProportion,lo.platformProportion,lo.coupon_id FROM user_lease_order AS lo INNER JOIN sys_user AS u ON lo.`openid` = u.`openid` LEFT JOIN hospital AS h ON h.`hospital_id` = lo.`hospitalId` LEFT JOIN sys_user AS su ON su.`user_id` = lo.`agentId`
mapper.select: where id = #{id}

SELECT a.openid,a.`order_number`,a.`device_number`,a.`device_type`, a.`lease_time`,a.`lease_address`,a.`restore_time`,a.`restore_address`,a.`price`, a.`investorProportion`,a.`hospitalProportion`,a.`agentProportion`,a.`platformProportion`, a.`pay_type`,a.`net_amount`,a.`coupon_price`,a.`status`,a.`play_time`,a.`choose`,a.`deposit`, a.`child`,a.`create_time`,a.`deposit_number`,b.rule,d.`device_mac`,d.`rows`,d.`device_address`, a.is_valid,a.`pay_type`,a.`time_price`,a.`fixed_price` FROM user_lease_order a LEFT JOIN device_rule b ON a.`device_number` = b.`device_number` INNER JOIN device d ON d.`device_number` = a.`device_number`
a.openid = #{openid} and a.is_valid = 1 and a.status = #{status}

SELECT (SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(1),0) FROM user_lease_order WHERE DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 0 DAY) <= lease_time AND `status` = 2 and is_valid = 1 ${params.dataScope}) AS `todayOrderNum`, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(net_amount),0.00) FROM user_lease_order WHERE DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 0 DAY) <= create_time AND `status` = 2 and is_valid = 1 ${params.dataScope}) AS todayOrderMoney, (SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(1),0) FROM user_lease_order WHERE DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= lease_time AND `status` = 2 and is_valid = 1 ${params.dataScope}) AS `sevenDayOrderNum`, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(net_amount),0.00) FROM user_lease_order WHERE DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= create_time AND `status` = 2 and is_valid = 1 ${params.dataScope}) AS sevenDayOrderMoney, (SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(1),0) FROM user_lease_order WHERE DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 29 DAY) <= lease_time AND `status` = 2 and is_valid = 1 ${params.dataScope}) AS thirtyDayOrderNum, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(net_amount),0.00) FROM user_lease_order WHERE DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 29 DAY) <= create_time AND `status` = 2 and is_valid = 1 ${params.dataScope}) AS thirtyDayOrderMoney
select distinct device_number from user_lease_order where device_number=#{deviceNumber} and status=0 and hospitalId=#{hospitalId}
where CONCAT(IFNULL(order_number,''),IFNULL(device_number,'')) LIKE concat('%',#{orderNumber},'%') and agentId=#{agentId}
where investorId LIKE concat('%"',#{investorId},'"%')
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM user_lease_order WHERE device_number = #{deviceNumber} and openid = #{openid} and status != 2
SELECT deposit_number FROM user_lease_order WHERE openid = #{openid} AND device_number = #{deviceNumber}

SELECT `id`,`openid`,`order_number`,`device_number`,`out_trade_no`,`device_rule`,`device_type`,`lease_time`,`lease_address`, `restore_time`,`restore_address`,`time_price`,`fixed_price`,`price`,`investorProportion`,`hospitalProportion`,`agentProportion`, `platformProportion`,`pay_type`,`net_amount`,`coupon_price`,`status`,`play_time`,`choose`,`child`,`deposit`,`create_time`,`deposit_number`,`is_valid` FROM `user_lease_order` where child = #{substring1} and `status` = 0

SELECT `id`,`openid`,`order_number`,`device_number`,`out_trade_no`,`device_rule`,`device_type`,`lease_time`,`lease_address`, `restore_time`,`restore_address`,`time_price`,`fixed_price`,`price`,`investorProportion`,`hospitalProportion`,`agentProportion`, `platformProportion`,`pay_type`,`net_amount`,`coupon_price`,`status`,`play_time`,`choose`,`child`,`deposit`,`create_time`,`deposit_number`,`is_valid` FROM `user_lease_order` where order_number = #{orderNumber}

SELECT `id`,`openid`,`order_number`,`device_number`,`out_trade_no`,`device_rule`,`device_type`,`lease_time`,`lease_address`, `restore_time`,`restore_address`,`time_price`,`fixed_price`,`price`,`investorProportion`,`hospitalProportion`,`agentProportion`, `platformProportion`,`pay_type`,`net_amount`,`coupon_price`,`status`,`play_time`,`choose`,`child`,`deposit`,`create_time`,`deposit_number`,`is_valid` FROM `user_lease_order` where child = #{substring1} and `status` = 0 and is_valid = 1

SELECT IFNULL(h.`hospital_name`,'无') AS hospitalName, IFNULL(su.`user_name`,'无') AS userName FROM device AS d LEFT JOIN hospital AS h ON h.`hospital_id` = d.`hospital_id` LEFT JOIN sys_user AS su ON su.`user_id` = d.`user_id` WHERE d.device_number = #{deviceNumber}

SELECT `id`,`openid`,`order_number`,`device_number`,`out_trade_no`,`device_rule`,`device_type`,`lease_time`,`lease_address`, `restore_time`,`restore_address`,`time_price`,`fixed_price`,`price`,`investorProportion`,`hospitalProportion`,`agentProportion`, `platformProportion`,`pay_type`,`net_amount`,`coupon_price`,`status`,`play_time`,`choose`,`child`,`deposit`,`create_time`,`deposit_number`,`is_valid` FROM `user_lease_order` where device_number = #{deviceNumber} and `status` = 0
